siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Emphasize values
frontmatter.description: Personal values matter, especially during challenging times. Find ways to emphasize values within the given structure and confines.

frontmatter.title: Finding good in the challenge
frontmatter.description: Find the good aspects that won't come back. Recognize the challenge is the only way forward.

frontmatter.title: Develop a better reality
frontmatter.description: Reality doesn't just happen to us. Many aspects are not controllable in the near term. Adjustments can be made to create and develop a better reality, rather than succumbing to setbacks.

frontmatter.title: Operate within constraints
frontmatter.description: Accept the given circumstances. Recognize the fallacies and limitations. Then operate as best as possible within those constraints. It's no longer possible, nor prudent to work to control elements outside the given constraints.

frontmatter.title: Adaptable routines
frontmatter.description: Create routines that can be easily adapted to keep some level of normalcy and productivity.

frontmatter.title: Smooth the path
frontmatter.description: We are heading into an unknown and it won't help if the path is equally bumpy for all. Look to smooth the path for others where possible because it will benefit everyone.

frontmatter.title: A decade stronger
frontmatter.description: Relationships take a lot of work and much good fortune. It's worth the effort, and those efforts and luck deserves celebration.

frontmatter.title: Incremental gains
frontmatter.description: Big gains feel unlikely in the current environment. String together small incremental gains for happiness and effectiveness. Incremental gains eventually lead to step change.

frontmatter.title: Small wins repeated
frontmatter.description: Spend more on the little things that bring small wins. Many of the big wins are gone for now. No travel, no events, no dinners out with friends.

frontmatter.title: Quality of life loss normalization
frontmatter.description: Much has been lost in terms of quality of life. This cannot become the new standard. Strive for even better than before.
